data.title: Comprehensive Celebrity Baby List 2013
data.meta_description:
January: 
Jan 05. Dakota - Girl - Rosie O’Donnell - Brothers: Parker, Blake; Sisters: Chelsea, Vivienne 
Jan 05. Caledonia Rose - Girl - Michael Kay and Jodi Applegate 
Jan 08. Marnie Rose - Girl - Lily Allen - Sister: E…

Thank you for this addition! They will be put on the list. I’ve never heard of her, but now I’m excited to see what she names her boy!

In other news, [name]Eli[/name] [name]Manning[/name] and his wife, [name]Abby[/name], are expecting a second child, due in [name]June[/name]. They are already parents to daughter [name]Ava[/name] [name]Frances[/name].

[name]Tennis[/name] player [name]Justine[/name] Henin gave birth to daughter Lalie.

Thanks for the info!

In other baby news:

• [name]Harold[/name] and [name]Brittany[/name] Perrineu welcomed daughter [name]Holiday[/name] [name]Grace[/name] on [name]March[/name] 21. [name]Holiday[/name] joins older sisters [name]Wynter[/name] [name]Aria[/name] (age 4) and [name]Aurora[/name] (age 18).

• [name]Andrea[/name] Casiriaghi and his fiancee [name]Tatiana[/name] [name]Santo[/name] [name]Domingo[/name] welcomed a son on [name]March[/name] 21. No name has been officially revealed by the palace yet, but it is rumored he is named [name]Raoul[/name].

• Actor [name]Johnathon[/name] Schaech and fiancee [name]Julie[/name] [name]Solomon[/name] revealed they are expecting a boy, due in [name]September[/name]!

• Singer [name]Kris[/name] [name]Allen[/name] and his wife [name]Katy[/name] revealed that they will be welcoming a boy (due [name]July[/name])!

More baby news!

• On [name]March[/name] 13, TV anchor [name]Veronica[/name] de la [name]Cruz[/name] welcomed son [name]Hartley[/name] [name]Eric[/name]. His middle name honors [name]Veronica[/name]'s brother [name]Eric[/name], who passed away in 2009.

• Proud grandmother [name]Princess[/name] [name]Caroline[/name] reportedly revealed that her grandson (parents [name]Andrea[/name] Casiraghi and [name]Tatiana[/name] [name]Santo[/name] [name]Domingo[/name]), who was born [name]March[/name] 21, is named [name]Sacha[/name]. We do not know if this is true, though.

• Actress [name]Jaime[/name] [name]Ray[/name] [name]Newman[/name] and husband [name]Guy[/name] Nattiv will welcome their first child, a daughter, this summer.

This was such a lovely message to wake up to, linda! Thank you very much! It’s really been such a fun project to work on.

She’s expecting a boy, and has supposedly decided on the name [name]Phaedra[/name] for him. She has not revealed a due date yet. [name]Baby[/name] boy will join big brother Astala [name]Dylan[/name] [name]Willow[/name].

In other baby news:

• [name]Kristen[/name] [name]Bell[/name] and [name]Dax[/name] [name]Shepard[/name] welcomed daughter [name]Lincoln[/name] [name]Bell[/name] on [name]March[/name] 28.

• On [name]March[/name] 23, actress [name]Shiri[/name] Appleby and fiance [name]Jon[/name] Shook welcomed a daughter. No other details have been released yet.

• [name]Kim[/name] Clijsters, who is due in [name]September[/name], revealed she will be welcoming a boy this time around. The tennis player and her husband [name]Brian[/name] [name]Lynch[/name] are already parents to 5-year-old daughter [name]Jada[/name] [name]Ellie[/name].

• TV correspondant [name]Jenna[/name] [name]Wolfe[/name] and her partner (also a TV correspondant) [name]Stephanie[/name] Gosk revealed they will welcome a girl in late [name]August[/name].

• Actress [name]Anna[/name] Chlumsky and her husband [name]Shaun[/name] So will be welcoming a baby this summer! [name]Anna[/name] revealed the baby will be a girl.

• Actress [name]Jamie[/name] [name]Lynn[/name] Sigler and fiance Cutter Dykstra revealed they will be welcoming a boy. The due date has not been announced yet.

As always, if you have anything to add, please let me know!

I love [name]Elizabeth[/name] [name]May[/name] and [name]Ellis[/name] [name]James[/name] for twins. Matching, but not too matchy. [name]Marnie[/name] [name]Rose[/name] and [name]Ethel[/name] [name]Mary[/name] are stunning names for sisters in my opinion. And I love how they are a bit old fashioned, but old fashioned names have been lately making a comeback. I also think [name]Rex[/name] [name]Rayne[/name] sounds pretty cool. As a guy growing up, I think I’d feel pretty cool with an awesome name like this one. Not exactly what I’d name my kid though. Vaunne [name]Sydney[/name] is nice too. I like how it’s a bit different, and sounds so beautiful when put together. My favorite combo for siblings is probably [name]Steve[/name] [name]Madden[/name]'s children- [name]Jack[/name], [name]Stevie[/name] and [name]Goldie[/name]. I like the tougher but cute sound of [name]Stevie[/name], and [name]Goldie[/name] just seems to be beautiful. [name]Hartley[/name]'s a bit of a different choice too. Can’t wait to see what the [name]Duke[/name] & Duchess name the child, and [name]Channing[/name] & [name]Jenna[/name] are an amazing couple, both very blessed with looks so I’d say that’ll be a beautiful baby. Also, [name]Holiday[/name], [name]Wynter[/name] and [name]Aurora[/name] are gorgeous.
